text: During his appearance on “ Jimmy Kimmel Live!, ” Mike Myers recalled working with “ Austin Powers ” co - star Verne Troyer, who died on April 21. With tears in his eyes, Myers told Kimmel that working with Troyer was “ the most amazing thing. Verne was a fantastic human being. ” “ Every day you see him, you go, ‘ Wow that is a small human,'” he said. “ But by the end of the day, you just saw Verne. It just sort of went away. He was part of the cast and fantastic.
